alert.note: Alert for Mendocino Coast; Northwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 30 at 2:37AM PST until January 31 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 1 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 30 to 40 mph with localized gusts to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Mendocino Coast and Northwestern Mendocino Interior Counties, with the highest gusts at coastal headlands and exposed higher terrain. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 1 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Most populated areas will have maximum gusts to 45mph; however, higher terrain areas within the advisory area could have localized gusts to 70 mph.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
